Docs.summary: An interface allowing for a cancellable stream reading operation.

remarks.para: This interface is meant to extend the functionality of a , allowing the to have much finer-grained canellability.
When a custom stream implementation also implements this interface, the will opt to use this interface instead of the normal API to read data from the stream.
This is really useful when parsing a message or other MIME entity directly from a network-based stream.
